home.heroSubtitle: We boost your company's efficiency and protection with customized technological solutions.

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: Ludaut Automation and Security SAS is a company focused on electronic security, automation, and systems integration across various sectors such as hospitality, restaurant, recreational, commercial, tourism, residential, and industrial, with almost 5 years of experience. We believe that the security and well-being of our clients are the foundation for building tomorrow.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To design, install, and maintain cutting-edge protection and automation technologies, creating personalized experiences that inspire trust, foster lasting relationships, and allow our clients to operate with complete peace of mind and efficiency.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be a benchmark in Latin America for comprehensive electronic security solutions, where innovation and closeness to our clients transform their spaces into intelligent, reliable environments prepared for future challenges.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We stay at the forefront of technology, exploring and applying disruptive solutions that anticipate the needs of our clients.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.text: We place our clients at the center of the project, listening actively and building alliances based on empathy and trust.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.text: We act with integrity and discipline, ensuring transparent and honest treatment with our clients and collaborators.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.text: We seek the highest quality in our processes and results, optimizing resources and exceeding expectations.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.text: Our passion is to protect what our clients value most, designing robust and reliable solutions.

adaptability.title: Adaptability
adaptability.text: We adjust with agility to technological changes and the particularities of each client, offering quick and effective responses.

founders.title: Meet Our Founders
founders.text: Founded by three engineers passionate about technology, Ludaut was born from the desire to offer a new way of approaching security: closer, more human, and tailored to your needs. In every project, we seek to build relationships of trust to grow together and protect what is most valuable: your peace of mind.

services.title: Our Solutions
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of integrated services to guarantee your security and optimize your operations.

cctv.title: CCTV - Video Surveillance
cctv.description: High-definition camera systems, night vision, and remote access for real-time monitoring from any device.

accessControl.title: Access and Personnel Control
accessControl.description: Specialized solutions to manage entry to facilities using biometrics, RFID, and facial recognition.

fireDetection.title: Fire Detection and Prevention
fireDetection.description: Systems compliant with the highest quality standards to ensure early detection and response to fires.

intrusionSystems.title: Intrusion Systems
intrusionSystems.description: Real-time detection of unauthorized access through motion sensors, magnetic contacts, and infrared barriers.

systemsIntegrator.title: Systems Integrator (BMS/VMS)
systemsIntegrator.description: We unify multiple technological systems (BMS, VMS, EMS) into a single, intelligent operational environment.

domotics.title: Domotics & Building Automation
domotics.description: We transform residential and corporate spaces into intelligent, efficient, and adaptive environments.

networking.title: Networks and Structured Cabling
networking.description: Design and installation of solid, organized, and scalable network infrastructures according to international standards.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: We apply AI to enhance efficiency and security through facial recognition, video analysis, and predictive automation.

soundAndLighting.title: Sound and Lighting Control
soundAndLighting.description: Creation of intelligent environments with ambient sound systems and automated lighting control.

videoIntercom.title: Video Intercoms
videoIntercom.description: Modern systems that combine security, comfort, and effective communication for residential and corporate access.

renewableEnergy.title: Renewable Energy Systems
renewableEnergy.description: Sustainable electrical solutions that integrate solar photovoltaic technology to reduce costs and optimize energy consumption.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We are ready to help you. Fill out the form or contact us directly.

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: We are located in the heart of Boyacá, ready to serve you. Let's talk about how we can help you with your next project.
